1.0.name: wordpress/random-flickr-favourites
1.0.description:
Generates a IMG tag with one of your favourites @ flickr.com.

Thanks to the wordpress community for this great blogging software, the php.net community for their fantastic documentation, Krischan Jodies for the recent comments plugin, which I analysed to learn how to write a wp plugin, Brian "ColdForged" Dupuis for the headline images plugin, which I also analysed to learn how to write a wp plugin.

More info at homepage of Random Flickr Favorites
